plugin.name: dbconsole
plugin.author: Mike Hugo
plugin.title: H2 DB Web Console
plugin.description: \ Provides a web based console for pre-1.4 grails apps Based entirely on Burt Beckwith's blog post: http://burtbeckwith.com/blog/?p=446 WARNING: This is an extremely insecure implementation. Clients are responsible for securing the /dbconsole url
